name: INNote
desc: The content and metadata associated with a single note entry in your app.

items.name: init(title: INSpeakableString, contents: [INNoteContent], groupName: INSpeakableString?, createdDateComponents: DateComponents?, modifiedDateComponents: DateComponents?, identifier: String?)
items.desc: Initializes a note object with the specified contents and attributes.

items.name: var title: INSpeakableString
items.desc: The title text for the note.

items.name: var contents: [INNoteContent]
items.desc: The main content of the note.

items.name: var groupName: INSpeakableString?
items.desc: The user-visible name of the group that contains the note.

items.name: var createdDateComponents: DateComponents?
items.desc: The creation date of the note.

items.name: var modifiedDateComponents: DateComponents?
items.desc: The date on which the intent most recently modified the note.

items.name: var identifier: String?
items.desc: The unique identifier that you use to identify the note internally.
